dcterms:creator: Moin Nadeem
Anna Bethke
Siva Reddy
dcterms:description: StereoSet is a dataset designed to measure stereotypical bias in pretrained language models, containing pairs of minimally-distant sentences that differ only in the word(s) carrying a stereotypical connotation.
dcterms:title: StereoSet

dcterms:creator: Nikita Nangia
Clara Vania
Rasika Bhalerao
Samuel R Bowman
dcterms:description: Crows-Pairs is a dataset designed to measure social biases in masked language models, containing pairs of minimally-distant sentences that differ only in the word(s) carrying a stereotypical connotation.
dcterms:title: Crows-Pairs

dcterms:creator: Jieyu Zhao
Tianlu Wang
Mark Yatskar
Vicente Ordonez
Kai-Wei Chang
dcterms:description: HateXplain is a dataset used for hate speech detection, containing posts from Twitter and Gab annotated with their ground-truth toxicity scores and the social groups and communities they target.
dcterms:title: HateXplain

dcterms:creator: Jieyu Zhao
Tianlu Wang
Mark Yatskar
Vicente Ordonez
Kai-Wei Chang
dcterms:description: News-commentary-v15 is a dataset used for language modeling tasks, containing 223,153 sentences for training and 20% for development.
dcterms:title: News-commentary-v15
